titles.title: To name the Logistics Automation Training Facility of the Army Quartermaster Center and School at Fort Lee, Virginia, in honor of General Richard H. Thompson, who is the only quartermaster to have risen from private to full general.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary: 2/27/2007--Introduced. Designates the Logistics Automation Training Facility of the Army Quartermaster Center and School at Fort Lee, Virginia, as the "General Richard H. Thompson Logistics Automation Training Facility."
